body_html:
@prb12, @shlens thanks for your advise.

I understood an API changes.

I tried to fix model/inception/inception/slim/ops.py . And successfully execute inception training jobs. Like below

      gamma = variables.variable('gamma',
                                 params_shape,
-                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer,
+                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer(),
                                 trainable=trainable,
                                 restore=restore)
body_text:
@prb12, @shlens thanks for your advise.
I understood an API changes.
I tried to fix model/inception/inception/slim/ops.py . And successfully execute inception training jobs. Like below
      gamma = variables.variable('gamma',
                                 params_shape,
-                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer,
+                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer(),
                                 trainable=trainable,
                                 restore=restore)
body:
@prb12, @shlens thanks for your advise.

I understood an API changes.

I tried to fix [model/inception/inception/slim/ops.py](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/inception/inception/slim/ops.py#L92) . And successfully execute inception training jobs. Like below

```diff
      gamma = variables.variable('gamma',
                                 params_shape,
-                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer,
+                                 initializer=tf.ones_initializer(),
                                 trainable=trainable,
                                 restore=restore)
```
